sentence.Network_en: In the construction of hydroelectric power station, eco - environment will be consequentially destroyed to some extent.
sentence.Network_cn: 在水电站建设中, 生态环境必然遭到一定程度的破坏.

sentence.Network_en: It was because of these subjective and objective reasons that it consequentially retreated from the history.
sentence.Network_cn: 正是由于这些主观和客观的原因,注定它必然要退出历史舞台.

sentence.Network_en: Controversy of different environment policy tool's validity consequentially returns to controversy between Caose and classicality.
sentence.Network_cn: 对不同环境政策工具的有效性的争论,也就必然回到科斯与庇古传统之间的争论.
